thread.title: Katy Perry’s Dancing House Fell Off Stage At Brit Awards, Is Our New Left Shark
thread.title_full: Katy Perry’s Dancing House Fell Off Stage At Brit Awards, Is Our New Left Shark

author: Robert Anthony
title: Katy Perry’s Dancing House Fell Off Stage At Brit Awards, Is Our New Left Shark
text:
Like Us On Facebook 
Have you seen Katy Perry’s performance at the Brit Awards?! 
The 32-year-old singer took the stage at The O2 arena in London to perform her hit songs, and I must say she CRUSHED it. That’s nothing new, though. Katy always crushes it. REX/Shutterstock 
Prior to her performance, the star took to Instagram, saying, 
Tonight, I’ll be making it rain Yorkshire puddings.. so ya, don’t miss it! 
Here’s her Instagram post. Believe the hype. 
It turns out she was 100 percent correct. She shut the stage all the way down! 
However, there was one tiny, little fuck-up in her performance that had nothing to do with her… Do you recall the time “Left Shark” was born during Katy’s Super Bowl XLIX halftime show performance? Giphy 
Yeah, those dance moves were WAY off. Well, this is similar to that. One of Katy Perry’s backup dancers has struck fame yet again after a giant flub at the Brit Awards. The dancer, dressed up as a little house, accidentally fell off the stage during the show. Now, try not to laugh… Katy Perry backing dancer falls off stage at Brit Awards To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
It’s hilarious, isn’t it?! I know, I know. Let’s just hope the human being underneath that costume isn’t injured because then it might not be so “hilarious” after all.
